snippet.title: The Hoaxer, The Troll And The Running Of The Digital Herd
snippet.description: Ti Kawamoto came out yesterday and admitted that he had created the suposed Sony Nexus X images that engulfed the tech blogs on Monday. This story seems to be the inverse of the much more disturbing tale of Violentacrez, the Reddit uber-troll who was forcibly outed last week. read »
